title: How does an orchestra stay organised? - Quora

response.answer_text: An orchestra is like any other band out there. They have their own specific parts that they learn and most of the time the practice before their concerts. The conductor and percussion is the main people keeping everyone together. The conductor keeps tempo and cues others when it’s their time to start playing in their music or get louder/softer. The percussion will help keep the beat for the entire orchestra
